extensionAttribute.displayName: OS - Disable CPU Kernel Core Dumps
extensionAttribute.description: This attribute verifies that CPU kernel core dumping is disabled.
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac: #!/bin/sh desiredResult="kern.coredump=0" result=`cat /private/etc/stsclt.conf | grep "$desiredResult" | tail -1` if [ "$result" == "$desiredResult" ]; then echo "<result>Pass ($result)</result>" else if [ "$result" == "" ]; then echo "<result>Fail (CPU Kernel Core Dumping Enabled)</result>" else echo "<result>Fail ($result)</result>" fi fi
